content: geo blanket materials sizes baby lap throw dimensions 66cm x 81cm 109cm x 117cm 138cm x 152cm yarn woolly 8ply 104m/50g quantity 7 balls / 728m 17 balls / 1768m 28 balls / 2912m needle 4mm circular needle 80-120cm depending on size gauge 19 5sts x 34rows to 10cm in pattern materials 2 stitch markers yarn needle 1 designed by emily bolduan © woolly yarn co 2020 pattern r18 k8 sm p1 p5 k3 p6 repeat to marker sm k8 note ​the stitch counts and quantities written are only a suggestion you can easily customize r20 k8 sm p1 p4 k5 p5 repeat to marker the size of your blanket by casting on a m​ ultiple sm k8 of 14 stitches + 17 ​and knitting until desired length r22 k8 sm p1 p3 k7 p4 repeat to marker sm k8 cast on 129 213 269 sts using your preferred method - we like the long tail cast on r24 k8 sm p1 p2 k9 p3 repeat to marker sm k8 next row ​k8 pm k to last 8 sts pm k8 r26 k8 sm p1 p1 k11 p2 repeat to marker knit 13 row slipping markers sm k8 working from written instructions or chart on r28 k8 sm p1 k13 p1 repeat to marker sm next page work row 1-28 of triangle pattern a k8 total of 8 12 16 times blanket should measure 76 5 112 5 147 5 cm from cast on once you have completed the number of repeats for your size work row 1-2 once more knit 14 row then bind off loosely triangle pattern weave in any ends and block gently to finish r1 rs and all following rs row ​knit to end r2 ws ​ k8 sm k1 p13 k1 repeat to marker sm k8 abbreviations r4 k8 sm k1 k1 p11 k2 repeat to marker k knit sm k8 p purl r6 k8 sm k1 k2 p9 k3 repeat to marker sm k8 sts stitches r8 k8 sm k1 k3 p7 k4 repeat to marker pm place marker on right needle sm k8 sm slip marker to right needle r10 k8 sm k1 k4 p5 k5 repeat to marker sm k8 r1 row 1 r12 k8 sm k1 k5 p3 k6 repeat to marker rs right side sm k8 ws wrong side r14 k8 sm k1 k6 p1 k7 repeat to marker sm k8 repeat repeat section in brackets r16 k8 sm p1 p6 k1 p7 repeat to marker sm k8 2 designed by emily bolduan © woolly yarn co 2020 chart our website is woollyyarn com ​ check out our stockist page for where you can find woolly near you 3 designed by emily bolduan © woolly yarn co 2020
